title: Rare Mutrie Portrait and Unbelievable Sure Shot!
author: Schwertfeger1007

posts.post_title: Rare Mutrie Portrait and Unbelievable Sure Shot!

posts.post_content: Wow, that is a fantastic Big Jim Mutrie card. Mine is the full length view. This is awesome. Best of luck with this sale!
Can you guys tell me the asking price on the Mutrie? I bought one about 8 years ago and thought it was really something. This is the first one I've seen offered for sale since I bought mine.
